short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mindful - Stay focused and mindful online with time tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing Mindful, the browser extension that helps you stay focused and mindful during your online activities. Mindful empowers you to take control of your digital habits and live a more intentional life
